For people who test packages that use MPI.jl, how do you design rank-specific tests? This seems to work but feels a little clunky
```if MPI.Comm_rank(MPI.COMM_WORLD) == 0
    # @test rank 0 stuff...
elseif MPI.Comm_rank(MPI.COMM_WORLD) == 1
    # @test rank 1 stuff...
...
end```
